Crime_Name: Discrimination based on race and color
Crime_Type: Human Rights Violations and Serious International Law Offenses
Decision_Outcome: Commission's decision set aside, case referred back for reinvestigation
Institutional_Action: Insufficient investigation, incorrect legal standard applied
Evidence_Type: Complaint allegations, procedural handling of investigation
Assessment_Standard: Prohibition of discrimination based on race and color
Protected_Group: Individuals based on race and color
Legal_Standard: Duty of fairness, proper application of discrimination test
Protection_Claim: Right to be free from racial discrimination in services
State_Protection_Assessment: Insufficient initial protection due to inadequate investigation
Legal_Provision: Section of the Canadian Human Rights Act prohibiting discrimination
Targeted_Group: Individuals of certain race or color
Claimant_Status: Individual filing a human rights complaint
Perpetrator_Entity: Financial institution staff (alleged), Canadian Human Rights Commission (procedural failure)
Legal_Basis: Violation of statutory human rights protections
